replies.body: So what about all those people who preemptively assumed they would be able to use the Alliance icon over 2 seasons and purchased the Alliance icon?

I don't see why that is relevant. Should I be mad if I bought a season 3 velocity icon and they got relegated? What if the alliance logo changed to something else? its not their fault someone bought something and a year later it got changed lol.. Next im going to complain to coke that I can't use their 1980's logo anymore
I would paid 10 000 RP for Moscow Five summoner icon
think bout it like this, your alliance icon will now be a legacy icon :D
Im confused.... Are alliance and eg getting kicked out of the lcs or are they just changing their names? Or...?
just changing their names. The person who owns the companies alliance gaming and evil geniuses is being told he can't have a vested interest in 2 teams. So EG and ALL have to change their names.
Would this also affect teams that are owned cross region. For example, if some one owned a team in china and in NA or EU?
